actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2193), a bill to grant States authority to enforce State and local sales and use tax laws on remote transactions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2193 (Remote Transactions Parity Act of 2017).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2193), a bill to grant States authority to enforce State and local sales and use tax laws on remote transactions, and for other purposes.
